Class Maxim.AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
  Maxim.AudioPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Maxim.AudioGenerator, Maxim.Synth
Direct Known Subclasses:
Maxim.WavetableSynth
Enclosing class:
Maxim
public class Maxim.AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Maxim.Synth, Maxim.AudioGenerator

This class can play audio files and includes an fx chain

Constructor Detail

Maxim.AudioPlayer

public Maxim.AudioPlayer(float sampleRate)
Create a new AudioPlayer object. Normally, you would not call this directly. Intead, call loadFile on the Maxim class.

Parameters:
flaot - sampleRate - the system sample rate

Maxim.AudioPlayer

public Maxim.AudioPlayer(java.lang.String filename,
                         float sampleRate,
                         PApplet processing)
Create a new AudioPlayer object. Normally, you would not call this directly. Intead, call loadFile on the Maxim class.

Parameters:
flaot - sampleRate - the system sample rate
String - filename - a mono WAV file to load
PApplet - processing - an instance of a Processing sketch, used to access the data folder.

public void setAnalysing(boolean analysing_)
Control if this AudioPlayer is doing spectral analysis or not

Specified by:
setAnalysing in interface Maxim.Synth
Parameters:
boolean - analysing - true to switch on analysis, false to switch it off
